MSM¶

class bestmsm.msm.MSM(trajectories, lag)¶

A class for constructing the MSM

Args:

trajectories (list of str): set of trajectories used for the construction.

lag (float): lag time for building the MSM

Attributes:

calc_count(trajectories, lag)¶

calculate transition count matrix

calc_rate(lagt)¶

calculate rate matrix using a Taylor series as described in De Sancho et al J Chem Theor Comput (2013)

calc_trans()¶

calculate transition matrix

check_connect()¶

check connectivity of rate matrix

Trajectory

Next topic

PCCA
